attributes.action: Do not prevent students who are not fully vaccinated from attending Universities
attributes.additional_details: Education is a right of the British people. Those who choose not to be vaccinated do so and their own risk. These draconian measures are unnecessary and will cause major disruption to education.
attributes.background: I want the government to not proceed in preventing those who are not fully vaccinated from attending university’s or student halls.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593410
